document.full_text: the united states drove global equity issuance in the first three months of the year, stealing asia's crown, after a spate of blockbuster u.s. ipos backed by private equity firms.
document.title: u.s. drives global equity fundraising in q1
lines_and_colors: the united states drove global equity issuance in the first three months of the year, stealing asia's crown, after a spate of blockbuster u.s. ipos backed by private equity firms.
